definition: network (computer, telecom)/Internet/Taiwanese term for 網絡|网络[wang3 luo4]

pinyin: gong1 gong4 jiao1 huan4 dian4 hua4 wang3 lu4
gong1 zhong4 dian4 xin4 wang3 lu4
qu1 yu4 wang3 lu4 ji4 shu4
zheng3 ti3 shu4 wei4 fu2 wu4 wang3 lu4
zheng3 ti3 fu2 wu4 shu4 wei4 wang3 lu4

sentences.english: The study used self-regulatory cycle to build the Self-regulated learning doctrine in WebQuest Learning system.
sentences.chinese: 開發具自律學習輔助機制之網路探究學習系統。

sentences.english: ROC Air force information system with internet service is a self-contained and privately operating network.
sentences.chinese: 空軍資訊系統網路服功能系獨立性之封閉型網路。

sentences.english: ROC Air force information system with internet service is a self-contained and privately operating network.
sentences.chinese: 空軍資訊系統網路服功能系獨立性之封閉型網路。

sentences.english: There’s even a term for it: the online disinhibition effect.
sentences.chinese: 甚至還有個術語叫網路的去抑效應。

sentences.english: Welcome to the Evangelical Formosan Church of Philadelphia resource link repository.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎來到費城臺服基督教會網路資源鏈接庫。

sentences.english: Inspired by the picture of a valkyrie I found on the internet.
sentences.chinese: 從網路上找到的北歐戰神使女的圖片得到的靈感。

sentences.english: Viewers around the world can catch a live webcast of the sold-out event in New York.
sentences.chinese: 全球的讀者可通過網路來觀看這一討論的現場情況。

sentences.english: You would drop fliers all over town. Online it's the same thing.
sentences.chinese: 業者會在鎮上廣發傳單，而網路上也是一樣。

sentences.english: Can not save them to a network drive or a floppy disk.
sentences.chinese: 不能救他們到一個網路磁碟或一個軟碟。

sentences.english: At present, I mainly responsibles for network and multi-national language respect.
sentences.chinese: 目前，我主要負責網路及多過語言部分。

sentences.english: When resistance in the circuit exceeds 140 ohms , the reading is not completely dependable.
sentences.chinese: 網路電阻超過140歐姆時，讀數就完全不準了。

sentences.english: Thoughout the last decade the Internet has become an important tool of communication.
sentences.chinese: 過去十年來網際網路已經成爲通訊的重要工具。

sentences.english: Guys, thank you for bringing this song up. It is a good tune, and I still remember .
sentences.chinese: 非常謝謝你們的點歌，網路上的資料可能有些混淆。

sentences.english: I see a question about a subnet mask .
sentences.chinese: 我看到一個關於子網路遮罩的問題。

sentences.english: Friends said that she had been a victim of cyber-bullying.
sentences.chinese: 朋友說，她是網路霸凌的受害者。

sentences.english: The subnet mask helps your computer define the difference between the two addresses.
sentences.chinese: 子網路遮罩幫助您的電腦定義在這二個位址之間的差。

definition: to go online/to connect to the Internet/(of a document etc) to be uploaded to the Internet/(tennis, volleyball etc) to move in close to the net
variant of 臺灣|台湾[Tai2 wan1]
